Text: E̩ne̩ ki fʼo̩la-wñ date̩ ojoji mak e̩wñ ki dʼowñ onugo e̩do̩ i atene
Ake̩do̩nʼo̩la-wñ ayo̩ ñw oji e̩wñ ema re n,
E̩ne̩bibi lewa, mak eke ño̩ lewa ge̩;
O̩la alu one̩ chʼomi ki nʼefu;
Ediba ñw e̩ne̩bibi,
Uko ake̩do̩nʼo̩la-wñ anʼaida wa,
Alu ake̩do̩nʼo̩la-wñ chʼe̩kpabie̩-wñ,
O̩la aro̩lo̩ dab o̩we̩ o̩je̩ ki arinyo̩;
E̩ne̩ ki chʼe̩nawule̩ ef uko̩lo̩ chʼọmaye e̩ne̩ ki akpa e̩wñ bie̩.
Odu Jihofa chʼo̩do̩go̩ ki gbiti;
E̩wñ kʼanana ne̩ chʼewo ki nʼaku ñw u,
Eke dʼe̩do̩ one̩ tak e̩kpabie̩ awa,
E̩ne̩ ki dohi o̩gba tak i gbʼo̩la,
E̩do̩ kʼone̩ ne̩ agwo̩nyʼowñ ef o̩ga-wñ;
E̩do̩ e̩ne̩ ki gbeju amʼe̩wñ,
Ele kʼone̩ che afʼuña ñw u
E̩ne̩ ki akʼomu-wñ o̩gba dabe̩ne̩ kʼi jale,
Anya ero̩ aje̩ ñw iñwa da
Efa o̩maye kʼe̩ jʼada-wñ mʼo̩la tʼewo ki gbiti edu le,
Efu one̩ ako̩ ñw e̩ro alu-wñ;
Uku kpai iñmi dʼef o̩da ukpalu,
E̩ne̩ ki fʼo̩ya li fʼe̩wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩ li,
Ologu eche chʼe-ame̩nukpa,
E̩ne̩ ki nʼamonuku wewe, mak e̩kpabie̩ o̩la-wñ i atene le̩,
